info.description: A Streaming app inspired by the OG's
info.title: StreamBuster API

post.description: Authenticates a user using the provided username and password, and returns a JWT token in a cookie if successful.

200.description: Successfully logged in, JWT set in cookie

post.description: Clear all authentication tokens from cookies and log out the user
Register a user with email, password, first name, and last name

get.description: Retrieve HTML content for a movie based on the provided tmdbId
Retrieve HTML content for a tv episode based on the provided tmdbId, season number and episode number

parameters.description: CurrentlyWatching object that needs to be updated
parameters.name: watch

parameters.name: media
